item.description:
Update: Deciding on Asmara near Central Square after knowing everyone's preferences. Vaibhav, take the T for 2 stops ;). I'll try to be there by 6:50 pm.

Some 'okay' weather coming our way this thursday people... so lets get out and meet friends! I heard that Ethiopian food is pretty similar to Indian food, so always been meaning to try some. Found these two restaurants in Cambridge, easily accessible from T (red line):


  • Addis Red Sea - near Porter Square station
  • Asmara Restaurant - near Central Square station


Asmara is just a little bit more expensive than Addis but both seem to have similar reviews on yelp, so I'll just pick the one which is convenient to most people. Please come out of your shells and meet fellow desis. Let me know which one you prefer in your RSVP.

See you there!
item.name: Ethiopian food anyone?
